tab2.text2:
-The use of any type of bug/exploit/cheats is prohibited
 -All types of discrimination towards other people are prohibited, both ingame and on discord
 -Casino area is PVE, hitting, stealing, sleeping or killing characters or dinos will be punished
 -Do not store or build anything near the casino (any structure that is there for more than 24 hours will be destroyed without prior notice)
 -Inside is prohibited (it will not be considered inside if the person who did it is admin or owner)
 -Scamming in trades is prohibited
 -It is forbidden to sleep or hold a character hostage for more than 5 minutes unless you are raiding him.
 -Building is prohibited in the Chitin Cave and its surroundings.
 To report any violation, open a ticket and write the following information:
 Your name in the game:
 Your tribe name:
 Ticket reason:
 Evidence:
 THE ADMINISTRATION MAY ADD/REMOVE OR MODIFY THE RULES AT ANY TIME WITHOUT PRIOR NOTICE
